Title: Starman
Actors: Jeff Bridges, Karen Allen, Charles Martin Smith, Richard Jaeckel
Plot: Jenny Hayden never did get over the death of her husband. So when an alien life form decides to model "himself" on the husband, Jenny is understandably confused if not terrified. The alien, or Starman, as he is called, has a deadline to meet, and kidnaps Jenny in order to meet it.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 5 nominations.
Production: Delphi II, Columbia Pictures Corporation, Industrial Light & Magic
